column2: the service was a bit slow. I understand it was lunch
column3: but I had just fainted at my physical
column5: but my waitress only checked on my once after my food came
column6: so I was a bit parched. My total ended up being 26 dollars. While I understand dining out in the city for lunch at a non-franchise place will be pricey
column7: I felt I was charged a bit high. They are doing something right
column9: because the place was full the whole time I was there.
